title: Amend. to operating plan for Trash Fund

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  147  	 INTRODUCED BY PRESIDENT LEWIS REED AND 							                   ALDERMAN STEPHEN CONWWAY    An ordinance, recommended by the Board of Estimate and Apportionment, authorizing a supplemental appropriation; amending Ordinance 68643, commonly referred to as the City of   St. Louis Annual Operating Plan for Fiscal Year 2010 2011; appropriating and setting apart into a new special Fund 1116 Metro Trash Services Fund from payments to be received from the   Bi-State Development Agency (operating as "Metro") Two Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($250,000) for the purchase of new trash receptacles by the City's Refuse Division to be placed at MetroBus stops within the City and Sixty Six Thousand Six Hundred Dollars ($66,600) as the pro-rated annual cost of Refuse Division trash removal services for the remainder of the current fiscal year as specified in a Memorandum of Agreement between the City and Metro; and containing an emergency clause.
